tool.name: MinHash approx k-neighbors
tool.description: approximate k-neighbors computation for sparse datasets

configfiles.configfile: from bioinf_learn import MinHash import sys input_json_path = sys.argv[1] input_json_raw = open(input_json_path, 'r') params = json.load(input_json_raw) options = params["input_types"]["algorithm_options"]["options"] minHash = MinHash() minHash.set_params(**options) prediction = minHash.fit_kneighbors(data_matrix)

tool.help: This tool computes the approximate k-nearest neighbors and works only on sparse datasets.
